text:
Please make the posibility of the regular expression in directive ServerAlias like this one:

<VirtualHost *:80>
  UseCanonicalName Off
  ServerAlias REGEX[^www\.[^.]+\.[^.]+$]
  VirtualDocumentRoot /home/html/DocumentRoot/%-2.0.%-1.0/public_html
</VirtualHost>
creator: ivanco@supervisor.sk
nick@webthing.com
text:
Enhancement request, not bug report.

FWIW, I think this is unlikely to happen, but 2.4 will offer an alternative wherein you can use <If expr="$Host matches your-pattern"> in a default vhost.
